description.en: Ultimate Zigbee Hub v2.1 - Complete unbranded Zigbee ecosystem with 57 professional drivers organized by function. Supports Motion Detection, Climate Control, Smart Lighting, Safety Systems, Covers, Access Control, and Energy Management. Local Zigbee 3.0 operation with 400+ manufacturer IDs, Johan Benz design standards, and SDK3 compliance. No cloud dependencies.

sources: Johan Benz GitHub Issues: Motion sensor requests
Blakadder device database: Tuya PIR sensors
